user.title: Select Operation Mode - Energy Hub Poland
user.description:
Choose how the integration should operate:
- **Dynamic Tariff:** Monitoring market prices (RCE).
- **Virtual G12/G12w Tariff:** Cost simulation for fixed tariffs.
- **Comparison Mode:** Real-time comparison of all tariffs.

g12_config.title: G12 Tariff Configuration
g12_config.description: Enter your G12 net rates and peak hour ranges.

g12w_config.title: G12w Tariff Configuration
g12w_config.description: Enter G12w net rates and weekday peak hours. Weekends and holidays are automatically set as off-peak.

energy_sensor.title: Energy Consumption Sensor Configuration
energy_sensor.description: Select an energy consumption sensor to enable cost and savings calculations. This step is optional.

reconfigure.title: Change Energy Hub Poland Settings
reconfigure.description: Update your tariff settings or change the energy consumption sensor.
